string.name: STR_CHAT_TEST_FA_KR_GOSSIP
string.body: Testing--1, 2. Testing--1, 2.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Start1
string.body: Curses to those who disturb the Current of Life.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: Oh, Breath of Life, return to the embrace of Pazuzu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Die1
string.body: Finally... I can return to him...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Die2
string.body: Pazuzu has finally... found a way to return...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Start1
string.body: None shall touch this artifact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Start2
string.body: Your pathetic power won't get you to the artifact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: You dare threaten me with attacks such as that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill2
string.body: Creatures of Aether, come forth and help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill3
string.body: Return to the flow of Aether, Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill4
string.body: Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Die1
string.body: Ah... I must protect... the... Aion Tower...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Start1
string.body: You won't touch the artifact, no matter what happens!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Start2
string.body: Those who threaten the artifact shall be returned to the flow of Aether!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: Face the wrath of the protector!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Skill2
string.body: Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Die1
string.body: I will curse you until the end...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Die2
string.body: Ah... The power, power of... Aion is...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt all return to the Aether's flow!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Kneel before the might of the earth!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Thy bodies shalt become heavy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill3
string.body: I will not be defeated by some lowly Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: This shall be your grave.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Face death, and despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: You shall not pass here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Face death, and despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Off to the darkness, all of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You fools. There is nowhere to run!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: The enemies are here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_OctacideNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: Kwiii!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_OctacideNamed_54_Ah_Die1
string.body: Kwiii!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimEngineerNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: I'll kill anyone who disturbs my work!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimEngineerNamed_54_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Oh no! I haven't finished the job yet...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimBoss_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Who dares seek out the Petralith?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimBoss_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Great Aion! Please forgive your poor servant...who has failed to fulfill his duties...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: You won't get past me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimNamed_54_Ah_Die1
string.body: No mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Kneel before me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Thou art not bad!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: There is nothing but bloody death for intruders.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: No, I can't lose anything else.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Urrrgh....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanScNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt not escape!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanScNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ah...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt be my redemption.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: We shall all be redeemed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Tiamat's favor is with us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt be my redemption.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: We shall all be redeemed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Tiamat's favor is with us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Gurrrgle....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Burp blerp...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Fresh meat! Fresh meat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Come forth, my faithful servants!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Hurry and devour these foolish Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Waagh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Whoever ye may be, thou shalt not escape this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Who dares despoil this holy place?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: My curse shall be upon thee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Something... has come...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Rebirth... Rebirth... Rebirth...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Bye... Bye... Bye...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying assumes an attacking posture!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying roars!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying screams!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You shameful, dirty, cowardly dregs!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Waugggh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Finally! I'm free of the curse! I'll never forget your kindness.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Time to incinerate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Flarestorm begins to laugh wickedly!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Flarestorm lets out a shriek and disappears!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShulackNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You'll never get back home alive!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_Boss_Shulack_Knight_Skill1
string.body: Waaaaaaaah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shulack_IDCatacombs_1_Wakeup
string.body: You saved my life. Thank you very much!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You stupid, foolish Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: The glory of Tiamat shalt spread across the world!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Leave1
string.body: Fools! Now dost thou understand the might of the Balaur?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: No! The seal! It must not break, or...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Freedom! And what luck that you're the first thing I've seen, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Experience the power of storms!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Come, thunder. Come, lightning. Wreak your havoc!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill3
string.body: I'll blow you all away.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill4
string.body: I can feel it. My powers are coming back!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill5
string.body: Even sealed, you worthless bugs are no match for me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrownieWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: Who are you? Do you have permission from master Hamerun?

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrownieWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: You won't come here, Daeva! Kakiti will stop you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_RatmanWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: I have no Odella to give to Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_RatmanWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: All Odella is for master Hamerun.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrowniePrisonWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: I shall not forgive you, Daeva, for getting in the way of master Hamerun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrowniePrisonWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: Intruder! Protect master Hamerun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: Aren't you a fearless one, to charge into Haramel like this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: I won't hand over my precious treasures so easily!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_3_batk_b
string.body: I will turn you into another one of my minions!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_1_kcast2_b
string.body: My servants, attack the one who defiles Haramel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_2_kcast2_b
string.body: My worshippers! Attack the enemy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Children of Drakan... Give your blood to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast4_b
string.body: Young Drakan, aid the Dramata!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Feel the fury! Feel my pain and wrath!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Die! You should all die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast13_b
string.body: Death to you all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast13_b
string.body: I shall punish you with my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_die_b
string.body: It can't end... like this...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_die_b
string.body: I hate myself! I resent this cursed body of mine...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_3_die_b
string.body: I should have... Become a... Great dragon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Oh, precious life... I will protect you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast4_b
string.body: Do not touch my eggs!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: My cry shall deafen your ears and blind your eyes!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Fear me! You must fear me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast13_b
string.body: Be gone! Forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast13_b
string.body: The earth will bind your feet.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_die_b
string.body: O Tiamat... Avenge me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_die_b
string.body: My...my eggs...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_3_die_b
string.body: Avenge me... Drakan of Inggison...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Aid me, honorable warrior of Elysea!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: All prayers to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast1_b
string.body: It is time for us to defeat the enemy! Give all your strength to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast2_b
string.body: Terror and death to the accursed intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast2_b
string.body: Be terrified forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast2_b
string.body: Pay the price with your lives!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_1
string.body: Still not enough! Prove your determination!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_2
string.body: Victory is nigh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_die_b
string.body: Lord Kaisinel... please help us...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_die_b
string.body: It isn't over yet... Lord Kaisinel will come to our aid...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Help me, heroes of Asmodae!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Pray for victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast1_b
string.body: We must stop the enemy! Give your strength to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast2_b
string.body: This is the end for the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast2_b
string.body: This is the end! Be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast2_b
string.body: The scale of victory has tipped to our side.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_1
string.body: Victory is close! Asmodians, show your strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_2
string.body: Pray harder! The enemy's end approaches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_die_b
string.body: Is fate... giving up on me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_die_b
string.body: Lord Marchutan! Please save us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_01
string.body: Shhh. First give a prayer to Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_02
string.body: Glory to Empyrean Lady Siel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_03
string.body: Lady Siel, give me strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_04
string.body: And enlightenment to the foolish one!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_PrisonGuards_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: Kromede has escaped!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_PrisonGuards_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Ugh...is anybody there...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: You have some guts coming out of there!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Damn it, master Kaliga has raised a Karnif pup.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Nevertheless...you won't be able to leave here alive...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_01
string.body: Heh, what do we have here? A new toy?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_02
string.body: What do you think of this new torture?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_03
string.body: Ugh...you will pay for this....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2up_Key_Butler_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: You are an uninvited guest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2up_Key_Butler_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Argh, I must inform my master that a guest has arrived....

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_01
string.body: Oh my! Who are you? And how dare you stroll into my bedroom just like that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_02
string.body: Why don't you try playing with my kids?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_03
string.body: Just wait. Once I let my husband know, you will be finished.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_01
string.body: My skills are superior to yours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_02
string.body: Behold! This is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_03
string.body: You are undeniably strong....

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_01
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_02
string.body: This is precisely what those who seek to climb above themselves need!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_03
string.body: You have grown powerful, Kromede. But still not enough to contend with me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_04
string.body: I need to rest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_05
string.body: Come forth, my children!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_06
string.body: You still have a long way to go. I will summon an opponent who will suit you perfectly.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_07
string.body: Damn it, I raised a Karnif pup!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_08
string.body: So, shall we start again, then?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_09
string.body: The real battle begins now.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_01
string.body: You dare challenge me? How exciting!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_02
string.body: This is my first judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_03
string.body: This is my second judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_04
string.body: Beg for forgiveness, before it's too late!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_05
string.body: You fool! This is my last judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Raid_Nr_Patterns_01
string.body: Mmmmm.... Rumble....

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Raid_Nr_Patterns_01
string.body: Heh heh heh, I will destroy everything....

string.name: STR_CHAT_NPC_Robstin_Patterns_01
string.body: No, Kromede! Run!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip1
string.body: Where is Pletus?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip2
string.body: The upper part is completed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip3
string.body: We are running out of time. Hurry up and finish!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip4
string.body: Yes, master.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip5
string.body: The Reians must have been desperate to send you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip6
string.body: Nice try... but it won't work.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip7
string.body: I imprisoned Davlin, so this mansion is MINE!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip8
string.body: My golem will crush you and your pet Reians!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip9
string.body: You're better than I thought. Not that it will do you any good.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip10
string.body: That's it! No more pulling my punches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip11
string.body: I'll teach you the price of provoking me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip12
string.body: This is what sets me apart from scum like you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip13
string.body: I'll finish this Huge Soul no matter what!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip14
string.body: You and your precious Reians will meet your doom!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Skill1
string.body: Thou shalt come to grief!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Skill2
string.body: I'll get rid of the cursed ones first!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Die
string.body: My lord Surama... I.. am... sorry.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill1
string.body: Power is... overflowing...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill2
string.body: Arrggh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill3
string.body: I'll... kill you all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Die
string.body: I need... more... Dragel...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Idle
string.body: Useless!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill1
string.body: Thy meddling shall cease!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill2
string.body: Ha, fly little Daeva... if you can.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill3
string.body: I'll show you what real power looks like!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Die
string.body: It's a shame... I deceived even Tiamat... and now a mere Daeva...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_L_Boss_Skill1
string.body: This Crucible certainly has lowered its standards.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_L_Boss_Die
string.body: You're better than I thought.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R1_Skill1
string.body: Let's start with some basic skills.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R1_Die
string.body: At least you know the basics.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R1_Skill1
string.body: How about starting from the basics?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R1_Die
string.body: At least you know basic skills.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R2_Skill1
string.body: Once the enemy feels fear, they will start to make mistakes.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R2_Die
string.body: You have nerves of steel.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R2_Skill1
string.body: Stay on your toes if you want to win.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R2_Die
string.body: You're good.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R3_Skill1
string.body: I won't pull my punches.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R3_Die
string.body: Excellent!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R3_Skill1
string.body: I won't pull my punches.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R3_Die
string.body: That's amazing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R4_Skill1
string.body: I never thought you'd do so well.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R4_Die
string.body: Excellent.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R4_Skill1
string.body: I never thought you'd make it as far as me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R4_Die
string.body: You're every bit as good as they said.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Skill1
string.body: The Stigma encapsulates the power and minds of our ancestors.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Skill2
string.body: You think you can take me with that tactic?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Die
string.body: You make your family line proud.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Skill1
string.body: The Stigma holds the memory of ancient warriors.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I expected more of you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Die
string.body: You are very good at communicating with the Stigma.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Skill1
string.body: Who are you Daevas?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I hope you all burn!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Die
string.body: Why... why do we have to fight?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill1
string.body: Who dared call me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I see you have chosen to die.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill3
string.body: Pathetic. Funny, but pathetic.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill4
string.body: Be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_End
string.body: You have no idea... who I am.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Die
string.body: I kept my bargain...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_Ranger_Broad
string.body: Here, over here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedA_Die
string.body: Thank you for freeing me from my Balaurean chains.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip1
string.body: Release me...from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip2
string.body: Release me...from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DisplayMsg1
string.body: The curse that binds Jurdin asserts itself.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip3
string.body: Thank you. You released me from my curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip4
string.body: Now I can...protect the forest...again.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_D_Boss_Skill1
string.body: This Crucible certainly has lowered its standards.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_D_Boss_Die
string.body: You're better than I thought.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_01
string.body: Welcome, Daeva. I am Administrator Arminos. The Empyrean Lords have made it clear that I am to assist you in your training.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_02
string.body: I feel my abilities could be better utilized in actual battle...but the lords know best...they say.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_03
string.body: I hope you'll liven things up here for me. And you'll be paid for your performance, of course.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_04
string.body: Let us see how you fare against my spirits... They are wild, bedeviling creatures, so watch your hide, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_05
string.body: Well, well, well...that wasn't too bad. Might even call that interesting.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_01
string.body: I'm glad you've returned. Last time was...rather disappointing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_02
string.body: This time your foes will be...more lively. They are Drakies under my command. The more you dispose of, the tastier the prize.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_03
string.body: Shall we get started?

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_04
string.body: Wonderful! Simply wonderful! If you ever return, I think I will face you personally.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_01
string.body: My word is stone, Daeva. We shall meet in battle.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_02
string.body: I bid you caution...even I cannot control them at times.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_03
string.body: I am disappointed, Daeva. I thought, perhaps, I had finally found someone who could keep me...entertained.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_04
string.body: Hahaha...this is terrific fun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Therma_Gossip1
string.body: Hello? Is there anyone out there?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Therma_Gossip2
string.body: I hear someone! Get me out of here, please!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Therma_Gossip3
string.body: Help! It's stifling in here, let me out!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_PrisonBreak_Gossip1
string.body: Thank you for releasing us.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_PrisonBreak_Gossip2
string.body: Thank you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_PrisonBreak_Gossip3
string.body: Hurry, let's go!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip1
string.body: Oooh, what delightfully delicious little meat morsels.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip2
string.body: Oh my my my, I do love that crunch!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip3
string.body: Now now, you'll cause me indigestion.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip4
string.body: Do have a rest. If you work too hard you'll become tough and stringy and stick in my teeth.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip5
string.body: Oh dear, don't you look savory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip6
string.body: Don't be afraid, little morsel. Fear makes you taste sour!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip7
string.body: Yes, yes, run around. You're quite piquing my appetite.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip8
string.body: Om nom nom nom...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip9
string.body: My tribe... will go on... without me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip1
string.body: I sense... impurity...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip2
string.body: I will teach you what suffering is.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip3
string.body: You cannot win.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip4
string.body: Your will is great, but your power is miniscule.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip5
string.body: I see your downfall in what you call your valor.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip6
string.body: This chamber will become your tomb.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip7
string.body: Your future is bleak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip8
string.body: But... I did not foresee this...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip1
string.body: Those who forsake the Forest will also be forsaken!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip2
string.body: You do not understand the power of nature...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip3
string.body: The sacred Forest rejects you, hoolu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip4
string.body: Leave our people be!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip5
string.body: Mother Forest, aid your humble disciple!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip6
string.body: You will be punished. Hoolu! Hoolu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip7
string.body: Help, help, help! Hoolulu hoolu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip8
string.body: I return... to your arms, Mother...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip1
string.body: You dare to challenge me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip2
string.body: Maybe you can swing a sword, but you can't control the Sandstorm!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip3
string.body: Huff snuff... is it time for a break yet?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip4
string.body: Bite, gore, gnash!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip5
string.body: Here we go!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip6
string.body: I am the great glorious Haridoo, Chieftain of the Humnaz! Who are you? Nobody!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip7
string.body: Stupid Togs, get them! Go on, bite, gore, gnash!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip8
string.body: This is getting tiring... Huff snuff.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip9
string.body: You're strong. But you're still too puny to be a chieftain.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip1
string.body: Don't bruise your tender meat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip2
string.body: My men will take care of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip3
string.body: Ugh, fine, I'll do it myself.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip5
string.body: This food is fighting back!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip6
string.body: Aren't you getting tired yet?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip7
string.body: It's time for you to die, snack.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip9
string.body: Not bad... for food...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Summon_1_Gossip1
string.body: Shiririk... tasty morsels everywhere, shiririk! Shiririk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Gossip1
string.body: Mother Forest, lend me your strength...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Gossip2
string.body: Our sacred forest will not have you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Gossip3
string.body: I call on you for help, Mother! Hoolu, hoolulu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Gossip4
string.body: This is our forest!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Gossip5
string.body: Not fair, not fair! Hoolulu...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip1
string.body: What? Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip2
string.body: Come fight with me, if you are not afraid. Ho huff ho ho!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip3
string.body: You craven little yearling!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip4
string.body: Look at that little thing! Where are your tusks, piglet?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip5
string.body: I will bash your head in with my stick, ho huff!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip6
string.body: I will show you, huff snuffle, to respect a true warrior!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Gossip7
string.body: I do not like to fight. Ho ho huff huff! Funny joke!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip1
string.body: Do you hunt for your grave?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip2
string.body: An intruder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip3
string.body: Why are you down here, little bird?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip4
string.body: Come closer. I will crush you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip5
string.body: This intruder must not hinder our work!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip6
string.body: What? Humans, here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip7
string.body: Touch nothing!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Tuca_Gossip1
string.body: You don't really want to hurt teensy Mookie?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Tuca_Gossip2
string.body: Lookit big Daeva meanie beating up little Mookie!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Tuca_Gossip3
string.body: Bad, mean Daeva! Bad!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_AncientClan_Ghost_Gossip1
string.body: I fight... still, I fight...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_AncientClan_Ghost_Gossip2
string.body: Come... join us.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_AncientClan_Ghost_Gossip3
string.body: So... cold...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_AncientClan_Ghost_Gossip4
string.body: That one... has... a soul?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_AncientClan_Ghost_Gossip5
string.body: You... disturb... my rest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_AncientClan_Ghost_Gossip6
string.body: I'm so... tired...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4A_UnarmedFighter_Gossip1
string.body: I shall crush you with these bare fists.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4A_UnarmedFighter_Gossip2
string.body: Men! To victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_DrakanWorker_Bomber_Gossip1
string.body: For the glory of Tiamat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumYM_Fighter_Gossip1
string.body: Brethren, to my aid!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumYM_Fighter_Gossip2
string.body: Be gone from our land!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumYF_Ranger_Gossip1
string.body: I am in danger. Friends, brothers, help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumYF_Ranger_Gossip2
string.body: You cannot stand against our herd.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumYF_Ranger_Gossip3
string.body: Wicked creature, my hoof will smash your head!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumM_Fighter_Gossip1
string.body: You there! What are you doing?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_BrohumF_Ranger_Gossip1
string.body: If you come to harm, it is your fault for crossing me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_ElementalLightF_Gossip1
string.body: I do not understand your senseless race.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Elementalking_Gossip1
string.body: Those who fight and kill their own kin should not be tolerated.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_ShulackAssassin_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: You there! You saw? There must be no witnesses!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv1_Gossip1
string.body: Men! To your duties!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv1_Gossip2
string.body: Failure... deserves death...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv2_Gossip1
string.body: Foul vermin, thy blood shall crust my boot.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv2_Gossip2
string.body: I am undone...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv3_Gossip1
string.body: Away with thee! Think thine a might matched to mine?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv3_Gossip2
string.body: What dishonor... to die at the hands of... a Daeva...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv4_Gossip1
string.body: I shall brook no delay!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv4_Gossip2
string.body: Lord Tiamat... I crave thy pardon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_Monarch_Gossip10
string.body: How unappetizing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Lost_Guardian_Gossip9
string.body: Perhaps now you begin to understand what true power is.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Owllau_Wizard_Chieftain_Gossip9
string.body: Thank you, Mother Forest, for guiding my wings.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Calydon_Fighter_Patriarch_Gossip10
string.body: Huff ho ho ho! That is why I am the great glorious Chieftain and you are not!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_SandWarm_General_Gossip10
string.body: Delicious, delicious!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv1_Gossip3
string.body: What effort squandered on such a trifle.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv2_Gossip3
string.body: I say again, these Daevas trouble us little more than insects.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv3_Gossip3
string.body: I cry havoc, men! Show no hint of mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_Named_Lv4_Gossip3
string.body: Thy sword is no equal to mine.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Ajenos_Gossip1
string.body: The forests teem with poisonous creatures. Be cautious and do not stray from the paths.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Ajenos_Gossip2
string.body: Keep a vigilant lookout for Dredgions, and listen for the sounds of their engines in the sky. They might return at any time!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_kantar1
string.body: Get your dirty claws off of that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_kantar2
string.body: Hey, help me out! These guys are tough!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_andes1
string.body: Take your filthy paws off that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_andes2
string.body: Help me! These guys are meaner than they look!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_D1
string.body: Lowly worms! I'll rest my sword in your skulls!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_D2
string.body: I am your doom!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_L1
string.body: Witless curs! I hasten your end!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_intro_L2
string.body: To your graves!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Station_DrakanNM_01
string.body: You find it easier to start a fight than finish it, I see!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Station_DrakanNM_02
string.body: Ah... Alas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Station_DrakanNM_03
string.body: I meet you head to head and blade to blade!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_op_training
string.body: Hurrah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Station_DoorCtrl_Evileye
string.body: INTRUDER ALERT. INTRUDER ALERT. SEAL OFF ALL VITAL SYSTEMS.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Jantaraz_EnterAttackState
string.body: Daevasssh? Hrrrrrrcht...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Jantaraz_UseSkill1
string.body: Flurrgh... flurrrrrrrgh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Jantaraz_UseSkill2
string.body: Fwaaaaaach!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Jantaraz_OnDie
string.body: Eeeeergh....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Tarotran_EnterAttackState
string.body: Ishishishik!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Tarotran_UseSkill1
string.body: Ishik!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Tarotran_OnDie
string.body: Hyaaak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Rasta_EnterAttackState
string.body: You hope to save her? Come, try!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Rasta_UseSkill1
string.body: A decrepit attempt, weakling.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Rasta_OnDie
string.body: Blast thee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Rasta_FallOff_EnterAttackState
string.body: Alert the Brigade General that they are here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Rasta_FallOff_UseSkill1
string.body: Pah! You... foul Daevas...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Kuhara_EnterAttackState
string.body: Captain Xasta is sapless, a fool. You shall not find the same of me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Kuhara_UseSkill1
string.body: Ba-BOOM! Such fireworks! Bwahaha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Kuhara_UseSkill2
string.body: I shall end you! Bwaha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Kuhara_OnDie
string.body: Out... in a blaze of... glory...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Nishaka_EnterAttackState
string.body: These are the Daevas sowing worry in our ranks? A jest, I am sure!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Nishaka_UseSkill1
string.body: Thy hand is too slow!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Nishaka_UseSkill2
string.body: Here, you fools!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Nishaka_UseSkill3
string.body: Nyahahahaha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Nishaka_OnDie
string.body: What have things come to?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_Gossip1
string.body: This situation rages out of hand, Merops. Things are not as you swore.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_Gossip2
string.body: Thou expectest thy 'noble' acts will be rewarded? Thou art a traitor, and nothing more!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_Gossip3
string.body: Take up thy cause with the grave!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_Gossip4
string.body: Vermin, fledglings! Away with you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_EnterAttackState
string.body: You hasten your deaths by provoking my wrath!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_UseSkill1
string.body: Stalwart Flame, rise!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_UseSkill2
string.body: Sacred Flame, blaze!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_UseSkill3
string.body: I will be thy gravedigger!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Vasharti_OnDie
string.body: My own death means nothing. Your tribe will perish in the sands of time...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip1
string.body: Reinforcements, finally!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip2
string.body: Go on ahead. I'll catch up.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip3
string.body: Follow these Daevas to victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip4
string.body: Everyone, back! Get back!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip5
string.body: Thank you, Daeva. We will take back Rentus Base together!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip6
string.body: Go on and take out the rest of those accursed snakes!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip7
string.body: Vasharti is defeated!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip8
string.body: We've done it! We've retaken the base!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Ariana_Gossip9
string.body: Our men will clean up the rest of this filth. Return to Rancora and inform them of our victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip1
string.body: Daevas have come? This is troubling...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip2
string.body: This changes nothing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip3
string.body: No, no... even with reinforcements, they can't take the base.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip4
string.body: No more of our children must die in futile battle!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip5
string.body: Umatha, I summon you to this fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip6
string.body: Don't be fools! Accept what fate has dealt you and escape to live what life you can!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip7
string.body: Give up! Pride and daring have no place in this world anymore.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip8
string.body: Go now and avoid more bloodshed!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip9
string.body: This base must fall so the Reian Tribe can live.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip10
string.body: Do not provoke Tiamat's further wrath!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip11
string.body: Kiriana, come! End these fools!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip12
string.body: Your courage is commendable... though unwise.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip13
string.body: If you truly care for your people, go back now. Tiamat's vengeance will be terrible!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip14
string.body: Why must you charge down this road to ruin?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip15
string.body: I say one final time: turn back now and accept your fate.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip16
string.body: Rentus is yours. It is time to fulfill your end of the bargain, Vasharti!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip17
string.body: What? No! No!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip18
string.body: Aah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip19
string.body: You... cannot pass...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip20
string.body: Leave... leave now...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_Merops_Gossip21
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Terma_Gossip1
string.body: Terma hear someone? Someone help Terma?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Terma_Gossip2
string.body: Get Terma out? Please?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Terma_Gossip3
string.body: Rock stifling Terma.Free Terma from rock!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Terma_WakeUp
string.body: Terma finally free! Maker bless kind Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Yurdean_Gossip1
string.body: Release me... from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Yurdean_Gossip2
string.body: This is not... life. I beg you... release me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Yurdean_Despawn1
string.body: Merciful Daeva, I thank you for your kindness.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Yurdean_Despawn2
string.body: My spirit will guard this forest path for eternity.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Yurdean_EnterAttackState
string.body: Jurdin, you're mine!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Yurdean_OnDie
string.body: No...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Kutoll_EntarAttackState
string.body: Kikikik! Strangers!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Kutoll_UseSkill1
string.body: Not finished yet!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Kutoll_OnDie
string.body: Kikikrrr...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Tourally_EnterAttackState
string.body: INVESTIGATING POTENTIAL SECURITY BREACH. HOSTILE PROTOCOLS INITIATED.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Tourally_UseSkill1
string.body: ELIMINATE THREAT. ELIMINATE THREAT.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Tourally_UseSkill2
string.body: SECURITY BREACH CONFIRMED. BACKUP REQUESTED.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Tourally_OnDie
string.body: WARNING. WARNING. SECURITY BREACH. SECURITY BREACH.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Kadela_Gossip1
string.body: The torso is completed, and the mobility unit is well under way.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Kadela_Gossip2
string.body: Yes, master, I do your bidding.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Kadela_EnterAttackState
string.body: Kill the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Kadela_UseSkill1
string.body: Heal me, you scrap-heaps!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Kadela_Sum_UseSkill1
string.body: Master calls... Healing protocol engaged...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_YunMale_Gossip1
string.body: That blasted Cadella has the rest of the alchemists locked up. But this gate is imbued with some kind of elemental defense...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_YunMale_Gossip2
string.body: What material are these bars made of? If you transform into an Anima of the opposite element, maybe we can break them down!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_YunMale_Gossip3
string.body: There are transformational items somewhere down here. Maybe they can help!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Plattooth_EnterAttackState
string.body: INTRUDER DETECTED. ENGAGING TARGET.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Plattooth_UseSkill1
string.body: INITIATE SECURITY SEQUENCE ALPHA.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Plattooth_UseSkill2
string.body: KILL. KILL. KILL. KILL.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Plattooth_UseSkill3
string.body: WARNING. INTRUDER ALERT. WARNING. INTRUDER ALERT.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Plattooth_OnDie
string.body: KILL. KILL. KILL. KRrrwww...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip1
string.body: Where is my Pletus? Where is my pet?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip2
string.body: It waits incomplete! Finish it or I shall finish thee.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip3
string.body: Puny Daeva, get out of my way!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip4
string.body: Measly thing, how can you hope to defeat me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip5
string.body: I have subdued Davlin, taken this forest and mansion for my own... what accomplishments have you to compare?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip6
string.body: I will crush thee like the insects you are.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip7
string.body: Die, wretched creatures!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip8
string.body: This is but a taste of my power.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip9
string.body: My beautiful creations will sow great misery amongst thy people!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra1_Gossip10
string.body: I will finish thee.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra2_WakeUp
string.body: Thou art nothing to me. I have built mightier things by my own hands and cunning!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra2_UseSkill1
string.body: I will complete my creatures!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra2_UseSkill2
string.body: The Reian Tribe will perish beneath the blows of my sweet creations!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra2_UseSkill3
string.body: There is no escape!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra2_UseSkill4
string.body: Pletus, my pet! Come to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_Zadra2_OnDie
string.body: Ugh! No! How...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Crack_EnterAttackState
string.body: I am the fist of the Dragon Lord Tiamat. His power is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Crack_UseSkill1
string.body: I call upon Lord Tiamat's Fissure! Rend these souls!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Crack_OnDie
string.body: I shall not perish... as long as Tiamat survives.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Gravity_EnterAttackState
string.body: I am the fist of the Dragon Lord Tiamat. His power is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Gravity_UseSkill1
string.body: I call upon Lord Tiamat's Gravity! Crush these souls!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Gravity_OnDie
string.body: I shall not perish... as long as Tiamat survives.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Fury_EnterAttackState
string.body: I am the fist of the Dragon Lord Tiamat. His power is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Fury_UseSkill1
string.body: I call upon Lord Tiamat's Wrath! Loose fury upon these souls!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Fury_OnDie
string.body: I shall not perish... as long as Tiamat survives.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Crystal_EnterAttackState
string.body: I am the fist of the Dragon Lord Tiamat. His power is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Crystal_UseSkill1
string.body: I call upon Lord Tiamat's Petrification! Ossify these souls!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_TiamatAvatar_Crystal_OnDie
string.body: I shall not perish... as long as Tiamat survives.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_GoldenTatar_EnterAttackState
string.body: I've killed bigger, meaner things than you, gyuk gyuk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_GoldenTatar_UseSkill1
string.body: Gyuk gyukuk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_GoldenTatar_UseSkill2
string.body: Fizzle, sizzle, burn! Gyuk gyuk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_GoldenTatar_UseSkill3
string.body: Why did you come?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_GoldenTatar_OnDie
string.body: Gyukukuk...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_CrystalPrime_EnterAttackState
string.body: What is this greedy creature who seeks to steal my power?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_CrystalPrime_UseSkill1
string.body: No one else can control this power. No one!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_CrystalPrime_UseSkill2
string.body: Why do you seek that which is useless to you? Go, leave me now!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4b_CrystalPrime_OnDie
string.body: You... will pay...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Summon1
string.body: Brothers, aid me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Summon2
string.body: I tire. Brothers, help!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Nepilim_Gossip8
string.body: That thing, a threat?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_risky_gossip1
string.body: That I should drink in the same room as an Elyos... it makes me want to spit!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_pers_gossip1
string.body: That clawless Ellie weakling over there is giving me the eye.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_ella_gossip1
string.body: Ick, what is that smell? It's those half-Draks over there, isn't it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_reblis_gossip1
string.body: That brute that's staring at me... I'll remember his face for the day we meet in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_risky_gossip2
string.body: Those sun-scorched fools think they're better than us? Well, a bat'll eat a glowworm, if you know what I'm saying.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_pers_gossip2
string.body: I will not forget him. This blasted truce does not reach everywhere.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_ella_gossip2
string.body: Let's hurry and go. Those animals are ruining my appetite.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_reblis_gossip2
string.body: Ugh, how can I enjoy a drink with that beast brooding at me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_ACT_1
string.body: Retreat! Retreat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4a_Public_ACT_2
string.body: We won! We've done it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_Solo_S6_VanqJr_55_An_Start
string.body: You sealed me! I've killed Daevas before, youngling, and I'll kill them again. Starting with you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_Solo_S6_VanqJr_55_An_EndBattle
string.body: Hwahaha! You have no idea who I am, do you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_Solo_S6_VanqJr_55_An_Dead
string.body: You'll see me again... soon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Key_EnterBattle
string.body: What in the world are the guards doing?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Key_LeaveBattle
string.body: Blast! Our work has been postponed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Key_Die
string.body: I have so much more to do...

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Key_Skill1
string.body: No more playing around!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_001_EnterBattle
string.body: I'll show you that military force is about more than just numbers.

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_001_LeaveBattle
string.body: How reckless to not think things through! Absurd!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_001_Die
string.body: You are all... vicious monsters...

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_001_Skill2
string.body: I can see three moves ahead of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_001_Skill1
string.body: This is going to be a bloodbath.

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_001_Skill0
string.body: Your petty tricks are laughable at best!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_002_EnterBattle
string.body: Yay! Fight, fight, fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_002_LeaveBattle
string.body: That's it? I'm disappointed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_002_Die
string.body: What's this? Borgalmar... can't seem to move...

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_002_Skill0
string.body: Bring it on! Hit me as hard as you can! I don't feel anything!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_002_Skill1
string.body: It's my turn, now. Block this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_002_Skill2
string.body: You can do better than that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_EnterBattle
string.body: You have come here only to find your death!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_LeaveBattle
string.body: This isn't over!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_Die
string.body: How could I lose to you...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_SKill3
string.body: I will crush your puny mind!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_Skill1
string.body: Let it burn!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_Skill2
string.body: Pfff! That tickles.

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_Skill0
string.body: I'll show you real pain!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_FinalEX_Skill4
string.body: I'll punish your insolence!

string.name: STR_CHAT_4BReward_Named_Final_Rage
string.body: You dare? I will bathe in your BLOOD!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintSpring_Gossip1
string.body: Spring has sprung, you'll be undone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintSpring_Gossip2
string.body: Sprouts, awake!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintSummer_Gossip1
string.body: The sun sear and scorch your sorry souls.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintSummer_Gossip2
string.body: Sun's light, blaze forth!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintFall_Gossip1
string.body: My gloom envelop you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintFall_Gossip2
string.body: Leaves flurry and winds blow!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintWinter_Gossip1
string.body: Fingers of cold creep up your spine...

string.name: STR_CHAT_HLFP_AgrintWinter_Gossip2
string.body: An icy chill will freeze your soul.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanMirrorNmd_Gossip1
string.body: A prisoner willingly walking into the interrogation room? Glorious!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanMirrorNmd_Gossip2
string.body: The last illusion! Now be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanMirrorNmd_Gossip3
string.body: The illusion never dies, only fades...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: The guilty hath come for their punishment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip2
string.body: Revel in the flames of death!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip3
string.body: O, the spirit of flame!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip4
string.body: For the glory of the Raksha Legion!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip1
string.body: ou Daevas must have come to celebrate my resurrection. Hahaha...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip2
string.body: Earth, arise! Thy master wills it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip3
string.body: Earth and stone, vanquish them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip4
string.body: I've quelled my anger for thousands of years! Now to fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip5
string.body: I've just woken up. I can't die like this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip1
string.body: For many ages, I have waited for this.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip2
string.body: Earth, arise! Thy master wills it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip3
string.body: Earth and stone, vanquish them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip4
string.body: I've quelled my anger for thousands of years! Now to fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip5
string.body: I've just woken up. I can't die like this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_0F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: I have no time to spare for foolish Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_0F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip2
string.body: Do you want to be like those Reians?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_2F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: Thou shalt rue thy curiosity!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_3F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: Thou hast slain a loyal servant of Raksha! Thy foolishness hast reached its peak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_5F_1_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: You Daevas hath come too far. Enough of this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_5F_2_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: Thou hast stepped right into your deaths, fool Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_5F_2_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip2
string.body: My Lord Tiamat, I have completed the mission.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hugen_01
string.body: Obstacle detected. Task priority adjusted.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hugen_02
string.body: Preset functions engaged.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hugen_03
string.body: Massive damage sustained to core. Contact repair drones... at once...

string.name: STR_CHAT_ShulackNM_00
string.body: Shulack pride forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_ShulackNM_01
string.body: Think you can take this?

string.name: STR_CHAT_ShulackNM_02
string.body: Nice and crispy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_ShulackNM_03
string.body: Run! Run! Or you'll be well done!

string.name: STR_CHAT_ShulackNM_04
string.body: Not one step closer, you hear?

string.name: STR_CHAT_ShulackNM_05
string.body: I gotta pull out my best trick!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanNM_01
string.body: Thou must be weary of life!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanNM_02
string.body: The grave calls to thee. Answer it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanNM_03
string.body: Vermin!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanNM_04
string.body: To be defeated by inferiors...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanNM_05
string.body: The Drakan were born to reign!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanNM_06
string.body: Prepare for suffering like nothing thou hast ever known!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DrakanShadow_01
string.body: Come... Oblivion beckons!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_1_01
string.body: Stand back. I will take care of this barrier.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_1_02
string.body: The Reian Soldiers will secure this area. You must press on. Hurry!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_2_01
string.body: I'm impressed! I thought the gatekeeper would be a greater challenge. I see we chose our champions well.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_2_02
string.body: There are reinforcements further in. We must deal with them.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_2_03
string.body: What are you waiting for? Get going!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_5_01
string.body: This makes no sense. There must be a way to get to Tiamat's throne from here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_5_02
string.body: Garnon? How did you get here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_5_03
string.body: You've found it? Where in the world was it?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_5_04
string.body: Let's not waste time. The final battle is upon us.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Garnon_1_01
string.body: Lord Kahrun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Garnon_1_02
string.body: We've found the entrance to the Dragon Lord's Refuge!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Garnon_1_03
string.body: The scouts we sent to Tiamaranta's Eye are the ones you should be asking.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_7_01
string.body: Tiamat. Hand over Siel's Relics and leave Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_7_02
string.body: My forces are on their way. Do you truly wish to face us in all-out battle? Such a choice will lead to tragedy for us all.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_7_03
string.body: Well then, you've chosen the path of destruction. Now you will see the true power of the Reian Tribe!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_7_04
string.body: Aarrghh! Si...Siel's Relics... They are more powerful than we ever imagined! Run! You must not try to face this alone.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_01
string.body: Me? Leave my throne? Hah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_02
string.body: Are you... threatening me? Is this what passes for a joke among you people?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_03
string.body: Don't worry. The tragedy will be all yours.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_04
string.body: You will feel despair such as you have never felt!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_05
string.body: Before I let Calindi destroy you, I will show you a glimpse of your people's ruin.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_01
string.body: I... yes. We are grateful. I don't know what we'd have done without your help...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_02
string.body: What are you talking about? Siel's Relics must be kept in the Reians' possession.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_03
string.body: Our tribe shed blood and tears to protect those relics!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_04
string.body: You?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_05
string.body: Wait! No!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_06
string.body: You can't!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kahrun_8_07
string.body: And after all we did to get here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_01
string.body: Kahrun. You are a fool to think you could confront Tiamat alone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_02
string.body: No need to thank me. Now, give me the relics, and I will be gone.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_03
string.body: Yes? And such a fine job you've done.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_04
string.body: How dare you raise your voice in this place? Be silent.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_05
string.body: Israphel? Here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_06
string.body: No!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_07
string.body: What do you think you're going to do with those?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_1_08
string.body: The traitor was right about one thing. We must put our argument aside and go after him.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_01
string.body: Ah, Kahrun. Getting a little ambitious, don't you think?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_02
string.body: You can thank me by giving me those relics, for safekeeping.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_03
string.body: That time is over, Kahrun.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_04
string.body: You didn't have the power to fight Tiamat, so what makes you think you can stop me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_05
string.body: You? What do you want?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_06
string.body: Stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_07
string.body: How far do you think you'll get with those?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_1_08
string.body: We must unite to stop him--but don't think that this argument is over!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Israphel_1_01
string.body: Well well. What's this? Bickering? And so soon after your glorious victory.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Israphel_1_02
string.body: Here, let me relieve you of the source of disharmony.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Israphel_1_03
string.body: Trust me when I say you'll thank me later....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_1_01
string.body: Tiamat. Hand over Siel's Relics and leave Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_1_02
string.body: My forces are on their way. Do you truly wish to face us in all-out battle? Such a choice will lead to tragedy for us all.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_1_03
string.body: Well then, you've chosen the path of destruction. Now you will see the true power of the Reian Tribe!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_1_04
string.body: Aarrghh! Si...Siel's Relics... They are more powerful than we ever imagined! Run! You must not try to face this alone.

string.body: Me? Leave my throne? Hah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Tiamat_02
string.body: Are you... threatening me? Is this what passes for a joke among you people?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Tiamat_03
string.body: Don't worry. The tragedy will be all yours.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Tiamat_04
string.body: You will feel despair such as you have never felt!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Tiamat_05
string.body: Before I let Calindi destroy you, I will show you a glimpse of your people's ruin.

string.body: I... yes. We are grateful. I don't know what we'd have done without your help...

string.body: What are you talking about? Siel's Relics must be kept in the Reians' possession.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_2_03
string.body: Our tribe shed blood and tears to protect those relics!

string.body: You?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_2_05
string.body: Wait! No!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_2_06
string.body: You can't!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kahrun_2_07
string.body: And after all we did to get here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_01
string.body: Kahrun. You are a fool to think you could confront Tiamat alone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_02
string.body: No need to thank me. Now, give me the relics, and I will be gone.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_03
string.body: Yes? And such a fine job you've done.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_04
string.body: How dare you raise your voice in this place? Be silent.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_05
string.body: Israphel? Here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_06
string.body: No!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_07
string.body: What do you think you're going to do with those?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Kaisinel_08
string.body: The traitor was right about one thing. We must put our argument aside and go after him.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_01
string.body: Ah, Kahrun. Getting a little ambitious, don't you think?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_02
string.body: You can thank me by giving me those relics, for safekeeping.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_03
string.body: That time is over, Kahrun.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_04
string.body: You didn't have the power to fight Tiamat, so what makes you think you can stop me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_05
string.body: You? What do you want?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_06
string.body: Stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_07
string.body: How far do you think you'll get with those?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Marchutan_08
string.body: We must unite to stop him--but don't think that this argument is over!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Israphel_01
string.body: Well well. What's this? Bickering? And so soon after your glorious victory.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Israphel_02
string.body: Here, let me relieve you of the source of disharmony.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Solo_Israphel_03
string.body: Trust me when I say you'll thank me later....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_Voice1
string.body: You've killed Sharbokan, but it will be your final victory.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_Voice2
string.body: Insolent Daevas! Destroying my lieutenants!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_Voice3
string.body: Laksyaka was useful to me. You'll see what happens to those who take away my tools.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_Voice4
string.body: Whatever agony my lieutenants felt as they died, you will feel tenfold!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kalyndi_Spawn_1
string.body: Dear Dragon Lord, please rest in peace. Let me avenge you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_01
string.body: We're in time!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_02
string.body: You should be honored, Tiamat. I came in person to kill you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_03
string.body: It is my destiny to destroy you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_04
string.body: I am weakening. You Daevas must take your turn.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_01
string.body: We're not too late!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_02
string.body: It's been a while, Tiamat.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_03
string.body: If that's what destiny asks of me, I'll accept it.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_04
string.body: I must rest a moment. Hold off the Dragon while I do!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_2_01
string.body: You, you must be...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_2_02
string.body: You will face not only my wrath but Fregion's as well!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_NPC_Tiamat_2_03
string.body: Behold the true power of a Dragon Lord!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_05
string.body: Dragon Lord! Be silent and accept your fate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_06
string.body: It is finally over.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kaisinel_T_07
string.body: Even a Dragon Lord can be driven to madness.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_05
string.body: Silence! There's nothing you can do to save yourself.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_06
string.body: Finally, Tiamat is dead.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Marchutan_T_07
string.body: I saw its despair, before the end.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_T_01
string.body: Aaarrgghhh!!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Guardian_EnterAttackState
string.body: Thou shalt never leave this room!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Guardian_OnDie
string.body: My Lord...Forgive me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Chantra_EnterAttackState
string.body: There is nowhere to run. Nowere to hide!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Chantra_OnDie
string.body: Tell Tiamat... I died fighting for our cause.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Sadha_EnterAttackState
string.body: Don't I remember you troublemakers from the Dredgion?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Sadha_OnDie
string.body: How humiliating... to die at your hand.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kumbanda_EntterAttackState
string.body: Let's get this over with. I have things to do.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kumbanda_OnDie
string.body: I regret nothing in my life, not even treachery.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Rakshaka_EnterAttackState
string.body: I devote myself to the Dragon Lord!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Rakshaka_OnDie
string.body: Argh...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Anuhart_EnterAttackState01
string.body: So many familiar faces, I see. Well, today wilt be thy final day!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Anuhart_EnterAttackState02
string.body: Consider it an honor to die by my hand.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Anuhart_UseSkill
string.body: I will crush you all!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Anuhart_OnDie
string.body: Tahabata, please avenge me... Eurrrrgh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tahabata_EnterAttackState
string.body: I've been keeping my flames warm for you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tahabata_OnDie
string.body: How... dare you...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kalyndi_WakeUp
string.body: Thinkest thou to defeat the Dragon Lord? First thou must survive my flames!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Kalyndi_OnDie
string.body: I may die, but my flames live on!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_GuardianDie
string.body: You've killed Sharbokan, but it will be your final victory.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_SadhaDie
string.body: Insolent Daevas! Destroying my lieutenants!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_RakshakaDie
string.body: Laksyaka was useful to me. You'll see what happens to those who take away my tools.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_TahabataDie
string.body: Whatever agony my lieutenants felt as they died, you will feel tenfold!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_SummonKalyndi
string.body: Calindi! Show them what true agony is!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_Tiamat_KalyndiDie
string.body: Calindi, your death is not in vain.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon1_EnterAttackState
string.body: I am the god of death, come to bring your doom!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon1_UseSkill
string.body: Siel's Relics will ensure our victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon1_OnDie
string.body: What? It was not supposed to be this way!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon2_WakeUp
string.body: You think you've weakened me? Hah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon2_UseSkill01
string.body: Every crisis feeds me strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon2_UseSkill02
string.body: That's it! I'm out of patience!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon2_UseSkill03
string.body: I'll finish you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon2_UseSkill04
string.body: You'll wish you'd stayed in your beds today.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_TiamatDragon2_OnDie
string.body: I... am... immortal...!
